metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14600 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libX11 through 1.6.5. The functionXListExtensions in ListExt.c interprets a variable as signed instead ofunsigned, resulting in an out-of-bounds write (of up to 128 bytes), leadingto DoS or remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.1
libx11-data - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.1
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libx11 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.1').
